name: Strike Survival Mission 3D
description:
Strike Survival Mission 3D is most addictive among these commando desert deadly shoot 3D games and deadly zombie target blood shoot adventure 3D games because this 3D secret crime shooting mafia game comes under the category of army extreme commando survival shooter games.You are real gangster gangster kill hunter and you are going for real contract man city gun killer with shooting sniper rifle to succeed in your stealth mission or in bullet battle war shooting force.
Features:

• Different shooting scenarios.
• Multiple survival missions in snow and windy environment.
• Stunning 3D graphics with amazing gameplay.
• Easy & intuitive controls.
